typography.instructions: Use Playfair Display for all H1-H3 headings to evoke premium quality. Use Manrope for body text for maximum legibility. Use Caveat sparingly for 'handwritten' notes or organic touches (e.g., '100% Natural' badges).

layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-16 for section padding. Avoid cramped layouts.
layout_strategies.grid_system: Use 'Bento' grids for categories. Avoid uniform 3-column grids everywhere. Mix wide and tall cards.
layout_strategies.hero_section: Asymmetrical. Text on left (40%), Image on right (60%) with organic shape mask or floating elements. Do NOT center text.
layout_strategies.product_grid: Clean, minimal. No borders on cards, just subtle hover lift. Focus on the image.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300

cards.behavior: Scale up slightly on hover (scale-105). Image zoom inside container.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle 'noise' or 'paper' texture overlay on the background to reduce digital sterility.
visual_enhancers.animations: Fade-in-up for all scroll elements. Staggered entrance for product lists.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide-react. Use thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) for elegance.

instructions_to_main_agent.file_types: Use .jsx for components and pages. Do not use .tsx.
instructions_to_main_agent.libraries: Use 'lucide-react' for icons, 'framer-motion' for animations, 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' for class handling.
critical_rules: Do NOT use generic 'Inter' font. Import Playfair Display and Manrope from Google Fonts.
Do NOT use standard blue/indigo colors. Stick to the Earthy Palette defined above.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Implement the 'Zouqly' logo with rounded corners as requested.
Footer must include address, email, and social links.

universal_guidelines.design_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Mix organic textures with clean modern layouts.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast meets WCAG AA. Use aria-labels for icon-only buttons.
universal_guidelines.motion: Micro-interactions are mandatory. Buttons should scale/color-shift on hover.
